text.text: How can I Change Claim's Status to Auto Crossover?

text: ZOLL Billing automatically updates the claim status from Submitted to Follow - up - Un - adjudicated after 30 days. This automatic change is based on the following number of days : 30 days after submission • Medicare & Medicare Replacement • Railroad Medicare • Medicaid & Medicaid Managed Care • Commercial Payers 60 days after submission • Auto • Workers Comp • Facility Payers • All non - primary claims ( excluding patient ) 90 days after submission • VA ( 90 days is set for the VA for both primary and non - primary claims ).

text.text: How can I set a claim to auto crossover?

text: To set a claim to auto crossover, you can hover over Claims on the navigation bar and click Waystar Submission. This will take you to the Claim Batches page where you can find additional information about the amount of claims in the batch.

text.text: How to Change Claim's Status to Auto Crossover?

text: To set a claim to auto crossover, you can hover over Claims on the navigation bar and click Waystar Submission. This will take you to the Claim Batches page where you can find additional information about the amount of claims in the batch.

Auto crossover is a feature that automatically updates the claim status from Submitted to Follow - up - Un - adjudicated after 30 days. This automatic change is based on the following number of days : 30 days after submission • Medicare & Medicare Replacement • Railroad Medicare • Medicaid & Medicaid Managed Care • Commercial Payers 60 days after submission • Auto • Workers Comp • Facility Payers • All non - primary claims ( excluding patient ) 90 days after submission • VA ( 90 days is set for the VA for both primary and non - primary claims ).
